00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LOV
00038 
00039 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00040 
00041 #include <obd_class.h>
00042 #include "lov_internal.h"
00043 
00049 int lov_merge_lvb_kms(struct lov_stripe_md *lsm,
00050                       struct ost_lvb *lvb, __u64 *kms_place)
00051 {
00052         u64 size = 0;
00053         u64 kms = 0;
00054         u64 blocks = 0;
00055         s64 current_mtime = lvb->lvb_mtime;
00056         s64 current_atime = lvb->lvb_atime;
00057         s64 current_ctime = lvb->lvb_ctime;
00058         int i;
00059         int rc = 0;
00060 
00061         assert_spin_locked(&lsm->lsm_lock);
00062         LASSERT(lsm->lsm_lock_owner == current_pid());
00063 
00064         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "MDT ID "DOSTID" initial value: s="LPU64" m="LPU64
00065                " a="LPU64" c="LPU64" b="LPU64"\n", POSTID(&lsm->lsm_oi),
00066                lvb->lvb_size, lvb->lvb_mtime, lvb->lvb_atime, lvb->lvb_ctime,
00067                lvb->lvb_blocks);
00068         for (i = 0; i < lsm->lsm_stripe_count; i++) {
00069                 struct lov_oinfo *loi = lsm->lsm_oinfo[i];
00070                 u64 lov_size;
00071                 u64 tmpsize;
00072 
00073                 if (OST_LVB_IS_ERR(loi->loi_lvb.lvb_blocks)) {
00074                         rc = OST_LVB_GET_ERR(loi->loi_lvb.lvb_blocks);
00075                         continue;
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 tmpsize = loi->loi_kms;
00079                 lov_size = lov_stripe_size(lsm, tmpsize, i);
00080                 if (lov_size > kms)
00081                         kms = lov_size;
00082 
00083                 if (loi->loi_lvb.lvb_size > tmpsize)
00084                         tmpsize = loi->loi_lvb.lvb_size;
00085 
00086                 lov_size = lov_stripe_size(lsm, tmpsize, i);
00087                 if (lov_size > size)
00088                         size = lov_size;
00089                 /* merge blocks, mtime, atime */
00090                 blocks += loi->loi_lvb.lvb_blocks;
00091                 if (loi->loi_lvb.lvb_mtime > current_mtime)
00092                         current_mtime = loi->loi_lvb.lvb_mtime;
00093                 if (loi->loi_lvb.lvb_atime > current_atime)
00094                         current_atime = loi->loi_lvb.lvb_atime;
00095                 if (loi->loi_lvb.lvb_ctime > current_ctime)
00096                         current_ctime = loi->loi_lvb.lvb_ctime;
00097 
00098                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "MDT ID "DOSTID" on OST[%u]: s="LPU64" m="LPU64
00099                        " a="LPU64" c="LPU64" b="LPU64"\n", POSTID(&lsm->lsm_oi),
00100                        loi->loi_ost_idx, loi->loi_lvb.lvb_size,
00101                        loi->loi_lvb.lvb_mtime, loi->loi_lvb.lvb_atime,
00102                        loi->loi_lvb.lvb_ctime, loi->loi_lvb.lvb_blocks);
00103         }
00104 
00105         *kms_place = kms;
00106         lvb->lvb_size = size;
00107         lvb->lvb_blocks = blocks;
00108         lvb->lvb_mtime = current_mtime;
00109         lvb->lvb_atime = current_atime;
00110         lvb->lvb_ctime = current_ctime;
00111         RETURN(rc);
00112 }
